lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Robert Fico said that his government would not allow Muslims to create “a compact community” and that integrating refugees was impossible.
snippet: Prime Minister Robert Fico said that his government would not allow Muslims to create “a compact community” and that integrating refugees was impossible.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis

abstract: Slovakian Prime Min Robert Fico says he will not allow Muslims to form their own community in country, yet states that it would be overwhelming task to integrate refugees; announcement follows Slovakia’s December 2015 legal filing challenging European Union’s migrant distribution plan.
